tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
I am glad I visited India for a vacation and went to Dr. Vedika khaneja as one of my friend recommended me. I made an last minute appointment with her and she assisted me thank you for that. I told her issues which i am facing with my teeth and she helped me with a solution. She told me why is it happening exactly, asked to take precautions since then i am very happy with my oral treatment.
Thank you Vedika for your time.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Wisdom Tooth Extraction,Filling Cavities,Ultrasonic Scaling Of Teeth,
review: I am completely satisfied with doctors treatment she have advised me extraction of my wisdom tooth, filling s and full mouth scaling

I was recommend to visit Dr. Khaneja for my dental treatment. At the beginning of my appointment, Dr khaneja sat with me to explain every little detail about the procedure to ensure I was fully aware of what course of action she will be taking. I was fully satisfied with the outcome as it was exactly the way she explained and kept me informed about her actions whilst treating my teeth. I would highly recommend her.

She is an absolutely brilliant doctor. She was recommended by my friend as I wanted some aesthetic work done to my teeth while on my holiday in India. I got an appointment the very next day. She is extremely professional and very friendly really happy with the results. In fact took my grandma there the following year to get some work done with implants.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I've done my rct done by here  doctor is so friendly and I'm completely satisfied with treatment thankyou mam
Very good staff all things are good  me and my enjoy the atmosphere and very happy to visit ..................

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Very professional, courteous and friendly throughout the treatment. Elaborated my issues really well and dealt with them patiently. Was aware of the issues that may crop up during the treatment and took adequate precautions and measures to deal with them, while keeping me updated on it. Treatment was provided on time for all sittings. I didnt feel pain during any of the sessions.Took good care to avoid discomfort during the treatment.
Experience with the doctor was good.  She explained everything peacefully.  Must visit her for ur issues

I had an excellent experience with Dr. Vedika Khaneja. Her professionalism, expertise, and caring demeanor made my dental appointment comfortable and pleasant. She took the time to explain everything thoroughly and made sure I felt at ease throughout the entire process. I highly recommend her to anyone seeking top-notch dental care.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Such a nice girl, soft spoken and deals Patients calmly like her family member. Lucky to get treatment done by her

She has good understanding and providing the proper guidance. And the best part is she can understand the patient pain.
I have got my filling done by vedika mam it was same as my tooth colour I am happy with treatment and get free from my cavities

I got my  scaling done. Had a great experience . She is very friendly and patient. 
Must visit her for your dental problems

Got pain free RCT done by Dr. vedika. She treated me calmly and patiently. 
Very good experience highly recommended
She is amazing..she made me feel really comfortable and she is very helpful. I would 100% recommend her.

Very very intelligent doctor 
Gave me quick relief from my toothache 
Not at all in a hurry 
Unbelievable low charges

She treated me properly and made me comfort as it was my proper first dental check up and done the cleaning properly. Also prescribed me medicines to make sure I don't have to go through the same problem again.

Not only did you skillfully diagnose and treat my condition, but you also took the time to listen to my concerns and answer all of my questions, which meant a great deal to me and my family. Your dedication to your patients is evident in everything you do, and I feel incredibly fortunate to have you as my doctor.
